title: Can anyone give me a quick rundown as to why PROJECT: Yi skin is the most expensive one?
body:
My friends all want to get one of the PROJECT skins that came out and since I'm their main jungler i'd have to go with Yi but he's so $$$$$$$....
What does Yi have that the others don't?

replies.body:
- New voice over
- Two voice filters
- New animations

> [{quoted}](name=KK Cruisin,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=VWtvwVF4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-09T22:58:44.747+0000)
>
> - New voice over
> - Two voice filters
> - New animations

They all have new voice overs and animations

The others have a filter over their original voice over. Yi has a completely new set of lines and uses a second filter in addition to the one the others use.

The others use their original animations but they also have new recall/spawn animations. Yi has a completely new set of animations.

Yup, these are all correct. 

He has a different VO processing when in Highlander. 

PROJECT: Yi's new animations include a new dance (and other emoteS), attack animations, and spell animations, such as Highlander.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=VWtvwVF4,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-10T00:06:04.196+0000)
>
> Yup, these are all correct. 
> 
> He has a different VO processing when in Highlander. 
> 
> PROJECT: Yi's new animations include a new dance (and other emoteS), attack animations, and spell animations, such as Highlander.

WTF is Highlander?
Highlander is the name of Yi's ultimate ability. It's the buff that makes him super fast.

Two unique things I have noticed in Yi among the PROJECT skins is the weapon changing with ult and the death animation, other than that I think it's a matter of personal opinion whether his animations, design and voice overs are better than the other skin.

> [{quoted}](name=TheLastShadow45,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=VWtvwVF4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-09T22:55:33.396+0000)
>
> Yi's is a legendary.

Go on.....
Why is only Yi the legendary one?

yi is a cheaper champion and is easily played. Noobies think theyre good with him, so they immediately buy a new cool looking skin without thinking. Rito uses this to cover up their story. They make more skins for cheap and easy to play champs to draw in the noobies.
